extendedInfo.description: Welcome to the largest collection of high-quality ringtones on Android Market!You get over 1000 (and growing) high-quality and unique ringtones for one price. What do we mean by "one price?" Simple, after you buy the app, you can download as many ringtones as you want for NO CHARGE! Zip, zero, nada.------------------ON SALE!  50% OFF!------------------Assign custom ringtones and notifications for your friends, family and co-workers. Have fun listening to the huge variety of sounds. All tones install with just a click of a button.ABOUT 1001 RINGTONES- Unlimited downloads!- Pay once! No Subscriptions!- Lifetime access!- Tones work as ringtones and Android notifications!Some sounds you will receive:- Classic old-phone ringtones (10)- Christmas Songs- Background Beat ringtones(50+)- Classical Song ringtones (50)- Dance Beat ringtones (20)- Soothing Sound ringtones (15)- Lounge Style ringtones (25)- Calm Sound ringtones (15)- Smooth Funk ringtones (15)- Techno Beat ringtones (40)- International Music ringtones (30)- And hundreds and hundreds of others (alarms, animal sounds, funny sounds, annoying sounds, interesting sound effects, national anthems for the USA and other nations, etcâ¦)Stop paying for each ringtone you download! We took extra care to select only the best tones and are happy to offer them ALL to you for one price!Just touch a ringtone name to listen to an 8-second preview. If you like what you hear, download the full tone -- up to 30 seconds long -- by selecting the tone and clicking "Download Selections" from the menu.Note: To download ringtones, you must have access to your wireless provider's data network, or Wi-Fi, or another Internet connection source. You also must have a media memory card.Enjoy!Here's a few ringtones you get:Alien Encounter Amazing Grace Ambulance Anchors Away Army Song Ass Whooped Auto Siren Banjos Belch Bell Cathedral Boogie Time Boss Hittin You Up Call From Loser Calm Bells Chill Chimes Clock Cuckoo Come All Ye Faithful Crow Devil Laugh Donkey Drum Beat Eighties Workout Electro Groove Evil Annoying Laugh Farm Yard Fart Fart Ringer Fart Song Fart Warning Feliz Navidad First Noel Funky Music Giggle Giggling Psycho Girlfriend Hittin You Up God Bless America Greatest Lover Gun AK47 Hallelujah Hark The Herald Angels Hey Beautiful Hip Hop Beat Holiday Fart Idiot Is Calling Joy To The World Jungle Beat Leopard Love Bells Machine Gun Marines Cadence Mexican Jumping Bean Music Box Naughty Words Out To The Ballgame Peanut Butter Jelly Time Pick Up The Phone Pinball Please Pickup Police Bullhorn Police Radio Race Car Rain Forest Rocky Road To Dublin Rooster Scary Sounds Scotland The Brave Remix Screaming Woman Sexy Goodlooking Shadow Dancing Silent Night Soft Chimes Soft Happy Space Ships Spanish Dancing Stars And Stripes Submarine Tarzan Yell Trumpet Twelve Days of X-Mas UFO Ultra Goove Upbeat Bells Vampire Vintage Cell Phone Violin Waa Waa Waaaaa Wife Calling Wild West Wish You A Merry Wolf Wont You Pick Up

reviews.title: I was expecting
reviews.comment: A little more... the ringtones cut off in the middle of the track...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The Best
reviews.comment: Samsung Galaxy Note Plenty to choose from and it\'s quick. I dont have to go online to download like I did with my iPhone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great App. Something for everyone. Helpful developers.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Quality is poor.
reviews.comment: I\'ll commend the number of ring tones, but the quality of then are horrible.
reviews.author: Matthew Ribbins

reviews.comment: How do you get to the menu!?

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: A top pick - lots of fun ringtones here. Nice price for so many tones!
